title: Alternative definitions for Magmas and Semigroups

blocks.name: cmgm2
blocks.content: Extend class notation with class of all magmas.

blocks.name: ccmgm2
blocks.content: Extend class notation with class of all commutative magmas.

blocks.name: csgrp2
blocks.content: Extend class notation with class of all semigroups.

blocks.name: ccsgrp2
blocks.content: Extend class notation with class of all commutative semigroups.

blocks.name: df-mgm2
blocks.content: A _magma_ is a set equipped with a closed operation. Definition 1 of [BourbakiAlg1] p. 1, or definition of a groupoid in section I.1 of [Bruck] p. 1. Note: The term "groupoid" is now widely used to refer to other objects: (small) categories all of whose morphisms are invertible, or groups with a partial function replacing the binary operation. Therefore, we will only use the term "magma" for the present notion in set.mm. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: df-cmgm2
blocks.content: A _commutative magma_ is a magma with a commutative operation. Definition 8 of [BourbakiAlg1] p. 7. (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: df-sgrp2
blocks.content: A _semigroup_ is a magma with an associative operation. Definition in section II.1 of [Bruck] p. 23, or of an "associative magma" in definition 5 of [BourbakiAlg1] p. 4, or of a semigroup in section 1.3 of [Hall] p. 7. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: df-csgrp2
blocks.content: A _commutative semigroup_ is a semigroup with a commutative operation. (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: ismgmALT
blocks.content: The predicate "is a magma." (Contributed by AV, 16-Jan-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismgmALT(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wbr(c2, ccllaw, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cmgm2, wbr(c2, ccllaw, c3), wbr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), ccllaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  breq12d(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), ccllaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cplusg)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  df-mgm2(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c2, ccllaw, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ismgmALT(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà MgmALT ‚Üî c2[clLaw]c3))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cmgm2, c2[clLaw]c3, (+ ` hs0)[clLaw](Base ` hs0))
  breq12d((+ ` hs0), ccllaw, (Base ` hs0), c2, c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((+ ` hs0), c2, (+ ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cplusg)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c3, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  df-mgm2(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c2[clLaw]c3)
}

blocks.name: iscmgmALT
blocks.content: The predicate "is a commutative magma." (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscmgmALT(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccmgm2), wa(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccmgm2, cmgm2, wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2), wbr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), ccomlaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  syl6bbr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), ccomlaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), ccomlaw, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  breq12d(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), ccomlaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cplusg)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  breq12i(c1, ccomlaw, c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  df-cmgm2(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmgm2)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscmgmALT(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CMgmALT ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà MgmALT ‚àß c1[comLaw]c2))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccmgm2, cmgm2, c1[comLaw]c2, (+ ` hs0)[comLaw](Base ` hs0))
  syl6bbr(hs0 = c0, (+ ` hs0)[comLaw](Base ` hs0), c1[comLaw]c2, (+ ` c0)[comLaw](Base ` c0))
  breq12d((+ ` hs0), ccomlaw, (Base ` hs0), (+ ` c0), (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cplusg)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  breq12i(c1, ccomlaw, c2, (+ ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  df-cmgm2(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmgm2)
  diff.hs0.w(c1[comLaw]c2)
}

blocks.name: issgrpALT
blocks.content: The predicate "is a semigroup." (Contributed by AV, 16-Jan-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm issgrpALT(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, csgrp2), wa(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wbr(c1, casslaw, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, csgrp2, cmgm2, wbr(c1, casslaw, c2), wbr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), casslaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  breq12d(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), casslaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cplusg)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  df-sgrp2(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmgm2)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c1, casslaw, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm issgrpALT(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà SGrpALT ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà MgmALT ‚àß c1[assLaw]c2))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, csgrp2, cmgm2, c1[assLaw]c2, (+ ` hs0)[assLaw](Base ` hs0))
  breq12d((+ ` hs0), casslaw, (Base ` hs0), c1, c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((+ ` hs0), c1, (+ ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cplusg)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c2, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  df-sgrp2(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmgm2)
  diff.hs0.w(c1[assLaw]c2)
}

blocks.name: iscsgrpALT
blocks.content: The predicate "is a commutative semigroup." (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscsgrpALT(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccsgrp2), wa(wcel(c0, csgrp2), wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccsgrp2, csgrp2, wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2), wbr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), ccomlaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  syl6bbr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), ccomlaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), ccomlaw, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  breq12d(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), ccomlaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cplusg)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  breq12i(c1, ccomlaw, c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  df-csgrp2(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csgrp2)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscsgrpALT(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CSGrpALT ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà SGrpALT ‚àß c1[comLaw]c2))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccsgrp2, csgrp2, c1[comLaw]c2, (+ ` hs0)[comLaw](Base ` hs0))
  syl6bbr(hs0 = c0, (+ ` hs0)[comLaw](Base ` hs0), c1[comLaw]c2, (+ ` c0)[comLaw](Base ` c0))
  breq12d((+ ` hs0), ccomlaw, (Base ` hs0), (+ ` c0), (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cplusg)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  breq12i(c1, ccomlaw, c2, (+ ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  df-csgrp2(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csgrp2)
  diff.hs0.w(c1[comLaw]c2)
}

blocks.name: mgm2mgm
blocks.content: Equivalence of the two definitions of a magma. (Contributed by AV, 16-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm mgm2mgm(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wcel(c0, cmgm))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wcel(c0, cmgm))
  pm2.43i(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wcel(c0, cmgm))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wcel(c0, cmgm2), wcel(c0, cmgm), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), ccllaw, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  ismgmALT(c0, cmgm2, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), ccllaw, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, cmgm), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), ccllaw, cfv(cbs, c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c0))))), wcel(cfv(cplusg, c0), universe), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), universe))
  fvex(cplusg, c0)
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  iscllaw(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c0), universe, cfv(cbs, c0), universe)
  biimprd(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wcel(c0, cmgm))
  ismgm(hs0, hs1, c0, cmgm2, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cmgm), wcel(c0, cmgm2), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), ccllaw, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  mgmplusgiopALT(c0)
  ismgmALT(c0, cmgm, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mgm2mgm(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà MgmALT ‚Üî c0 ‚àà Mgm)
} = {
  impbii(c0 ‚àà MgmALT, c0 ‚àà Mgm)
  pm2.43i(c0 ‚àà MgmALT, c0 ‚àà Mgm)
  sylbid(c0 ‚àà MgmALT, c0 ‚àà MgmALT, c0 ‚àà Mgm, (+ ` c0)[clLaw](Base ` c0))
  ismgmALT(c0, cmgm2, (+ ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  syl5bi(c0 ‚àà MgmALT, (+ ` c0)[clLaw](Base ` c0), c0 ‚àà Mgm, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)‚àà(Base ` c0))))
  mp2an(((+ ` c0)[clLaw](Base ` c0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)‚àà(Base ` c0)))), (+ ` c0)‚àà ùïå, (Base ` c0)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(cplusg, c0)
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  iscllaw(hs0, hs1, (+ ` c0), universe, (Base ` c0), universe)
  biimprd(c0 ‚àà MgmALT, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)‚àà(Base ` c0))), c0 ‚àà Mgm)
  ismgm(hs0, hs1, c0, cmgm2, (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0))
  mpbird(c0 ‚àà Mgm, c0 ‚àà MgmALT, (+ ` c0)[clLaw](Base ` c0))
  mgmplusgiopALT(c0)
  ismgmALT(c0, cmgm, (+ ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: sgrp2sgrp
blocks.content: Equivalence of the two definitions of a semigroup. (Contributed by AV, 16-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sgrp2sgrp(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, csgrp2), wcel(c0, csgrp))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, csgrp2), wcel(c0, csgrp), wa(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), casslaw, cfv(cbs, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cmgm), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)))))))))
  bitri(wa(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), casslaw, cfv(cbs, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cmgm), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)))))))), wa(wcel(c0, cmgm), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), casslaw, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), casslaw, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, cmgm))
  mgm2mgm(c0)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, cmgm), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), casslaw, cfv(cbs, c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2))))))))
  mp1i(wcel(c0, cmgm), wb(wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), casslaw, cfv(cbs, c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)))))))), wa(wcel(cfv(cplusg, c0), universe), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), universe)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(cfv(cplusg, c0), universe), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), universe))
  fvex(cplusg, c0)
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  isasslaw(hs0, hs1, hs2, cfv(cplusg, c0), universe, cfv(cbs, c0), universe)
  issgrpALT(c0, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  issgrp(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sgrp2sgrp(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà SGrpALT ‚Üî c0 ‚àà SGrp)
} = {
  3bitr4i(c0 ‚àà SGrpALT, c0 ‚àà SGrp, (c0 ‚àà MgmALT ‚àß(+ ` c0)[assLaw](Base ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà Mgm ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà(Base ` c0),((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)[(+ ` c0)]hs2)=(hs0[(+ ` c0)](hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)))))))
  bitri((c0 ‚àà MgmALT ‚àß(+ ` c0)[assLaw](Base ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà Mgm ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà(Base ` c0),((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)[(+ ` c0)]hs2)=(hs0[(+ ` c0)](hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)))))), (c0 ‚àà Mgm ‚àß(+ ` c0)[assLaw](Base ` c0)))
  anbi1i(c0 ‚àà MgmALT, (+ ` c0)[assLaw](Base ` c0), c0 ‚àà Mgm)
  mgm2mgm(c0)
  pm5.32i(c0 ‚àà Mgm, (+ ` c0)[assLaw](Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà(Base ` c0),((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)[(+ ` c0)]hs2)=(hs0[(+ ` c0)](hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2))))))
  mp1i(c0 ‚àà Mgm, ((+ ` c0)[assLaw](Base ` c0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà(Base ` c0),((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)[(+ ` c0)]hs2)=(hs0[(+ ` c0)](hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)))))), ((+ ` c0)‚àà ùïå ‚àß(Base ` c0)‚àà ùïå))
  pm3.2i((+ ` c0)‚àà ùïå, (Base ` c0)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(cplusg, c0)
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  isasslaw(hs0, hs1, hs2, (+ ` c0), universe, (Base ` c0), universe)
  issgrpALT(c0, (+ ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  issgrp(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs2.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs2.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}
